alert.note: Alert for Pushmataha (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 05 at 3:59AM CDT until May 06 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Kiamichi River near Antlers affecting Pushmataha County. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING TO EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Kiamichi River near Antlers. * WHEN...From Friday morning to early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 25.0 feet, minor flooding begins along the west bank of the Kiamichi River near Moyers. Campers along the river should move to higher ground. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:30 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 11.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 25.0 feet tomorrow morning, then start falling. - Flood stage is 25.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
